Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.name: minimumLogLevel
Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.abstract: The minimum LogLevel determining which log will be included in the logging destination.

Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.name: maxMessagesLength
Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.abstract: The max length of the logging messages.

Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.name: timestampFormatter
Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.abstract: The DateFormatter that determines how the timestamp of the message will look like.

Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.name: truncatingToken
Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.abstract: The token appended at the end of a truncated string.

Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.name: isEqual(to:)
Protocols/LoggerConfiguration.html#/s:9M.abstract: Whether or not the configuration is equal to the given one.

Classes/Logger/Log/Level.html#/s:9MGELog.name: trace
Classes/Logger/Log/Level.html#/s:9MGELog.abstract: Messages that contains information only when debugging a program.

Classes/Logger/Log/Level.html#/s:9MGELog.name: debug
Classes/Logger/Log/Level.html#/s:9MGELog.abstract: Messages that contain information normally of use only when debugging a program.

Classes/Logger/Log/Level.html.name: Level
Classes/Logger/Log/Level.html.abstract: Log level for the Logger used to determinate what to omit from logging output.

Classes/Logger/Log.html#/s:9MGELogger6Lo.name: Severity
Classes/Logger/Log.html#/s:9MGELogger6Lo.abstract: Syntactic sugar for severity of the log levels.

Classes/Logger/Context.html#/s:9MGELogge.name: timestamp
Classes/Logger/Context.html#/s:9MGELogge.abstract: The timestamp of when event logged happened.

Classes/Logger/Context.html#/s:9MGELogge.name: filePath
Classes/Logger/Context.html#/s:9MGELogge.abstract: The path of the file in which the event logged happened.

Classes/Logger/Context.html#/s:9MGELogge.name: line
Classes/Logger/Context.html#/s:9MGELogge.abstract: The line of the file at which the event logged happened.

Classes/Logger/Context.html#/s:9MGELogge.name: function
Classes/Logger/Context.html#/s:9MGELogge.abstract: The line of the file in which the event logged happened.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:9MGELogger6Logger.name: isEnabled
Classes/Logger.html#/s:9MGELogger6Logger.abstract: Whether the logger is enabled or not.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:9MGELogger6Logger.name: init(with:)
Classes/Logger.html#/s:9MGELogger6Logger.abstract: Applies the given configuration to the logger.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:9MGELogger6Logger.name: defaultConfiguration
Classes/Logger.html#/s:9MGELogger6Logger.abstract: Provides the default configuration for the logger.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:9MGELogger6Logger.name: isDisabled
Classes/Logger.html#/s:9MGELogger6Logger.abstract: Whether the logger is disabled or not.
